name: df-leag
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cleag, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))), wrex(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cinag, cv(s0)), cs3(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cfv(cv(s2), nat2))), wbr(cs3(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), cfv(cv(s1), nat1), cfv(cv(s1), nat2)), cfv(ccgra, cv(s0)), cs3(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: Definition of the geometrical "angle less than" relation. Definition 11.27 of [Schwabhauser] p. 102. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Oct-2020.)
